metadata.title: CVE-2022-1973 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernel in log_replay infs/ntfs3/fslog.c in the NTFS journal. This flaw allows a local attacker tocrash the system and leads to a kernel information leak problem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
